title: CVS said to be closing in on deal to acquire home-health company Signify; If CVS does reel in Signify Health, it will have bested rival suitors including Amazon and UnitedHealth
text:
UnitedHealth never submitted an official bid, one of the people said.

There is still no guarantee that CVS will reach a deal for Signify, which has been exploring strategic alternatives since earlier this summer.

An expanded version of this report appears at WSJ.com.

CVS said to be closing in on deal to acquire home-health company Signify
